overview: A female vampire from the planet Arus [who] tries to vampirize the descendants of Dr. Fun Helsing.  A film that wallows in smut, sleaze, gore, splatter, and dark comedy and is set in an underground world where both vampires and punk rockers engage in straight, lesbian & gay hardcore sex to the highly addictive and hypnotic electro music of Model D’oo
title: Vampiros Sexos
